$description: Canonical port data registry for In the Wake - used by weather validator and weather fetcher

tropical-hurricane.description: Tropical climate with Atlantic/Caribbean hurricane exposure
tropical-hurricane.hazardNote: Atlantic hurricane season runs June 1 through November 30, with peak risk in September and October.

mediterranean.description: Mediterranean climate with dry summers and mild winters
mediterranean.hazardNote: Summer can be very hot; spring and fall offer ideal temperatures.

alaska.description: Subarctic maritime climate with cool summers and cold winters
alaska.hazardNote: Cruise season runs May through September. Expect rain; pack layers.

northern-europe.description: Maritime temperate climate with mild summers and cool winters
northern-europe.hazardNote: Weather can be unpredictable; pack layers and rain gear.

pacific-tropical.description: Pacific tropical climate with potential typhoon exposure
pacific-tropical.hazardNote: Pacific typhoon season can affect itineraries June through November.

temperate-atlantic.description: Temperate Atlantic coast with four distinct seasons

asian-monsoon.description: Asian monsoon climate with wet and dry seasons
asian-monsoon.hazardNote: Monsoon season June-September brings heavy rain; dry season ideal for cruising.

1.name: Tier 1: Comprehensive
1.description: Hand-curated, richest content with all features enabled
requirements: Full seasonal guide with local detail

2.name: Tier 2: Standard
2.description: Templated with regional defaults plus light edits
